fields.content:
Apple App Store: [https://apps.apple.com/sg/app/1000-hours/id1589268189](https://apps.apple.com/sg/app/1000-hours/id1589268189)
Google Play Store: [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.jedychen.one_thousand_hours](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.jedychen.one_thousand_hours)

Concept / Design / Prototyping / Development / App Release / Maintenance

fields.title: Result
fields.description: 6000 downloads in 3 months

fields.title: Privacy Policy
fields.description: Information about user data, security and service providers.

content.value: Some new functions are added to the app based on users’ feedback. Previously the app only allowed users to key in hours manually. After getting some requests for an automatic timer, I decided to add it in and figured out a proper way to integrate the new timer with the existing functions without breaking the app or the user experience.

fields.title: App Release
fields.description: Release, bug fixing, new features, customer relationship, and so much more

content.value: Learning from work, I use a priority matrix to evaluate the priority of feature requests, and bugs based on usability. It helped me to concentrate on the most impactful tasks with my limited time.

After releasing the app, I received some negative user feedback due to the app being unstable. Therefore, I spent countless hours improving the app stability and design of the UI / UX. The app interface is almost completely redesigned after a few iterations. Slowly, I got more and more positive reviews, and even encouragement from users via Gmail and Linkedin, saying how much they love my app!

fields.title: 1000 Hours - Design System Images
captions: App localization and copy management, powered by Google Sheets Sync Figma plugin

content.value: In the actual development, I put quite some effort into optimizing app performance and code structure. The app is built to store all user data locally to avoid any concerns for data privacy. It dramatically simplified the user experience as there is no login process and requirement for internet connections. There is also minimum opacity transition, and widget functions, which help create a smoother experience in Flutter.

fields.title: 1000 Hours - Design Tools
captions: Generating theme colors using Material Design color tool

fields.title: Public Performance at Light Canvas
fields.subtitle: i Light Singapore Festival
fields.description: I was invited to perform at the Light Canvas installation at i Light Singapore Festival 2022. The installation empowers the audience to turn their movements into illuminations, and I designed and presented a light painting performance there to demonstrate its possibilities.

content.value: Of course, I also built my own design system on Figma covering components, page sections in auto layout, edge states, localization, and responsiveness on different screen sizes: aiming to reflect all the technical considerations upfront in the UI design.
I leveraged many online tools to help me put together all the design: such as design direction, color theme, animation for splash screen and loading, user flow design, and more.

fields.title: Back Story
fields.description: An app distilled from my wife’s need for practicing dancing

content.value: There is a detail I added in rotating the wheel: each increment of time triggers a gentle vibration. A continuous spinning of the wheel will generate vibrations similar to winding a watch. I think this micro-interaction is powerful in that it conveys a clear message while being fun to play with.

fields.title: Privacy Policy URL
fields.subtitle: App Store / 1000 Hours
fields.description:
Jedy Chen built the 1000hours app as a Free app.

This page is used to inform visitors regarding my policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use my Service.
If you choose to use my Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy. The Personal Information that I collect is used for providing and improving the Service. I will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy.

The terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions, which is accessible at 1000hours unless otherwise defined in this Privacy Policy.

content.value: This work represents an immense success as the code-generated expressions have been transformed into a commercially viable campaign with global impact. The success affirms the importance of collaboration and partnership between design and technology, even for more traditional mediums like commercials.

fields.title: Innovation
fields.description: The world-first, scientifically accurate, fully 3D, real-time Age Simulation Engine.

fields.title: Design System
fields.description: A system balancing aesthetics and functionalities, with thorough documentation and demos for development

fields.title: Design
fields.description: How to visualize “Collaboration”?

fields.title: App Features
fields.description: A simple, direct way for tracking practice time

content.value: After 3 months of the app launch, there are more than 6000 downloads on the App Store. I received quite some valuable feedback on all the app platforms. The app is free, but surprisingly I received some donations from users which encourages me a lot!
Powered by Flutter, the app is launched on three major app platforms, iOS App Store, Google Play Store, and Huawei App Gallery.

The main interface of the app, a rotatable wheel, is inspired by the iPod's click wheel. I felt it is an intuitive way to input time accurately by spinning a dial, and therefore built a prototype to validate the interaction. I had to do my own mathematical calculation for the interaction as there is no existing library in the market.
I was invited by the creators of Light Canvas to give a public performance there to demonstrate the installation’s interactions and creative possibilities, and create a sense of wonder and intrigue.

fields.title: Background
fields.description: A public performance at Singapore’s leading light festival

fields.title: Light Canvas - Performances
fields.description: All the artist performances at Light Canvas, including mine

content.value: This storytelling is about my personal story with my grandfather, who had a great influence on my growth, my education, and my personality. He passed away a few years ago without me being around. I do want to take this performance in memory of him, and his heritage I would carry on.

fields.title: Concept
fields.description: A storytelling via stop motion

content.value: Because of the special material used for the canvas, light drawings fade away after a few minutes. So it's impossible to complete a giant drawing without any part missing.

Inspired by stop motion animation, I designed my performance to be a sequence of drawings, each drawing is easy to finish fast and has strong connections with the previous ones. I can simply overlap new drawings on top of the old ones to push forward the narrative.

fields.content: Jeremy Lin, Rollen Gomes, Alice Giselle

content.value: Light Canvas is an interactive installation at I Light that invites you to turn your movements into illuminations on the reactive digital canvas. The audience can use the flashlight from their mobile phone to fill the installation with stunning light drawings.

i Light Singapore is Asia’s leading sustainable light festival held in Marina Bay. It showcases light art installations created by Singaporean and international artists. These artworks are designed with energy-saving lightings and/or environmentally-friendly materials to encourage festival goers and the general public to adopt sustainable habits in their everyday lives.

While other trackers stuff their app with countless reminders, numerous complicated functions, 1000 Hours is just here helping users quickly record their every single minute achieving their goal. Here are some key features of 1000 Hours:
Goal: Set habit goals, 1000 hours for example, and choose fun icons for it.
Tracker: Record the hours you have practiced each day. Manually key in the time or turn on the timer to track automatically.
Memo: Leave a diary of your progress and vibe of the day, with texts and images.
History: Check your records in a calendar view.

The concept of 1000 hours started from my wife’s struggle. She picked up dancing a while ago and wanted to track her dance practice time. However, she couldn’t find an app suits her needs. I just gained experience from developing Zig at work, which is a super app with many complex functions. So I promised to make an app for her, in three days.
The design system is one outcome of the collaboration between the design engineering team and the design team.

fields.title: Beyond Time - Aging Research Video
fields.description: Research - How Japanese's facial wrinkles and spots change across different age stages

content.value: The executive creative director of the Samsung account in R/GA recounted that our work contributed significantly to the campaign development. As a result, the Mill made four commercials for the campaign. The outcome was heavily based on the generative expressions, and the four commercials ran across globally for several months.

fields.title: Zig - Design System - Gallery in the app

content.value: 1000 Hours is designed to meet a simple need: track how much time users practice for a habit.

fields.title: Zig - Design System - Component Gallery Explanation

content.value: Afterward, the design engineering team built all the components in code and created a component gallery within the app structure. Each component has a separate demo page in the gallery, demonstrating all the functions and variations available for use. Developers can easily open this gallery from the app and check how to use each component via interactive demos and code examples.

With face captured and rendered in 3D, our engine can accurately reflect environmental lighting, track minor facial expressions, and generate dynamic skin wrinkling in the real-time renderings. It creates the degree of realism that we needed for participants to truly engage one another in an emotional experience through various life stages.

fields.title: Beyond Time - Age Simulation Tech Overview

content.value: R/GA New York showcased these generative expressions to the CMO of Samsung USA. He and his team were thoroughly impressed.
One of the core innovations in this project is a bespoke 3D facial age simulation engine I developed from scratch for the experience.
I was surely overconfident at that moment. It ended up taking me 3 months to just complete the core functions.

The foundation of this technology lies in a century of Shiseido’s extensive scientific research on skin science and knowledge from experts in senescence technology from Hokkaido Information University.

Having a design system significantly speeded up our development time. With those reusable components, the development team focused more on logic and built more than 700 screens and edge cases in a relatively short amount of time.

fields.title: Innovation - Led the creation of our method

content.value: Leveraging the most recent technologies in computer vision, face tracking, and CG rendering, I led the creation of our unique, innovative age simulation which reproduces the derived aging process digitally on a user's face in 3D and in real-time.

fields.title: Zig - Design System - Comparison to Flutter Library

content.value: We verified every component based on Google Flutter’s existing widgets early when creating wireframes to guarantee components’ feasibility. All components tightly ‘fit’ the Flutter library but with an entirely distinct, branded look and feel.

fields.title: Contact Us
fields.description: If you have any questions or suggestions about my Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact me at jedy829@gmail.com

content.value: The design system consists of 3 important parts:
General app styles (including color, font size, elevation)
Components (such as Button, Card, Dialog, Drawer, Filter, Form, Header, List item, Maps, Snackbar, Tab, etc.)
Responsiveness
Collaboration invokes conversations. Conversely, conversations tighten collaboration and spark new ideas.

The Academy expression represented R/GA’s first endeavour utilizing IBM’s Watson APIs to achieve a creative outcome. The research and development phases allowed for unique insights into the APIs’ applicabilities and the data derived when they were appropriated for different intents.

fields.title: Zig - Design System - Introduction of Design System

content.value: Delivered using Flutter, Google’s latest mobile technology platform, the app was built once and deployed twice for iOS and Android, which also unlocked the possibility of having a singular experience across all mobile devices.

Together with the design team, we created an original design language for the new brand and developed it into a design system. It is a truly modular, truly future-proof design system that is used in both product design on Figma and the tech team’s implementation into the app.

fields.title: Design - Reason to choose the sound wave

content.value: In this sense, we chose the sound wave as the form to visualize conversations, representing the pulse of collaborations. The sound wave expresses transmissions of information and reflects the process of exchanging and building-up. It is a form that can be easily translated, replicated in various ways, such as being used to shape a sound sculpture.

fields.title: Beyond Time - Tech Overview and Summary

content.value: Beneath its minimalist exterior, the installation contains a considerable amount of technology, including depth cameras, high-resolution color cameras, sensor-based interface, and variable-opacity privacy glass for a fully immersive experience.
The Academy expression was well received and the apprentices were intrigued by the multidisciplinary approach and its process.

To power our aging simulation engine, I designed and developed a 3D facial data capture solution, faster and easier to operate. With this customized solution, we collected a vast 3D face database from over 500 actual Japanese people and extracted aging features from those data using advanced pattern detection algorithms. With all those combined efforts, we managed to derive a pattern on how Japanese faces are generally aged.

fields.title: 1000 Hours
fields.subtitle: A minimalist habit tracker
fields.description: 1000 Hours is a minimalist habit tracking app that I designed and developed by myself. Using Figma and Flutter, I combined my knowledge of UI/UX design, design language system, and app development all into this app and released it to the major platforms, including Apple App Store, Android Play Store, and Huawei App Gallery.
